items.title: iPhone 17：使用全新的双重拍摄视频功能 (原标题: iPhone 17: Using the New Dual Capture Video Feature)
items.creator: Tim Hardwick
items.summary:
# iPhone 17：使用全新的双重拍摄视频功能

iPhone 17 系列引入了一项名为“双重拍摄”（Dual Capture）的全新视频功能，允许用户同时使用前置和后置摄像头进行录制。这项功能创建画中画视频，非常适合制作反应视频、教程或任何需要同时捕捉自己和前方动作的场景。

## 功能概述
*   **核心功能**：同时使用前置和后置摄像头录制视频，生成画中画效果。
*   **适用场景**：反应视频、教程、内容创作等。
*   **支持机型**：iPhone 17 系列所有机型，包括 iPhone Air。

## 如何启用双重拍摄模式
1.  **打开相机应用**：在 iPhone 上启动“相机”应用。
2.  **选择视频模式**：在底部选择“视频”选项。
3.  **访问菜单**：
    *   点击界面右上角的点状图标。
    *   或者，从底部轮播中选定的视频选项向上滑动。
4.  **选择双重拍摄**：从弹出的菜单中选择“双重拍摄”。
5.  **开始录制**：点击取景器中的快门按钮，即可开始同时使用前置和后置摄像头进行录制。

![iphone 17 dual capture video](https://images.macrumors.com/t/udMWxWRUO_ZcacY2f27kIDzzt8Y=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iphone-17-dual-capture-video.jpg?lossy)
*启用双重拍摄模式后的相机界面*

一旦使用过双重拍摄模式，在当前应用会话的剩余时间内，相机界面右上角会显示一个便捷的新图标，允许用户无需通过弹出菜单即可快速开启或关闭此功能。

![enable dual capture video iphone 17](https://images.macrumors.com/t/PPiBtxy8AFIk8Cs1frarOTPMaJE=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/enable-dual-capture-video-iphone-17.jpg?lossy)
*双重拍摄模式的快捷开关图标*

## 录制期间可进行的操作
*   **切换镜头（Pro和Pro Max型号）**：在录制过程中，iPhone 17 Pro和Pro Max型号的用户可以在48MP主摄像头、48MP超广角和48MP长焦镜头之间切换，以获得不同的视角，而无需停止录制。
*   **移动前置摄像头窗口**：较小的前置摄像头预览窗口可以通过手指拖动在屏幕上移动，这在预览窗口遮挡了重要画面时非常有用。请注意，窗口的任何重新定位都会保存在最终视频中。

![iphone 17 dual capture move camera window](https://images.macrumors.com/t/F6l1zTTIpojhiaJnJY18fbT5bVg=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iphone-17-dual-capture-move-camera-window.jpg?lossy)
*拖动前置摄像头窗口以调整位置*

## 录制质量和限制
*   **分辨率和帧率**：双重拍摄支持1080p或4K分辨率，帧率为24或30 fps。为了后期编辑的最大灵活性，建议选择4K 30fps。
*   **布局限制**：该功能目前仅限于苹果的单一布局设计，即后置摄像头占据大部分画面，而前置摄像头显示在一个较小的窗口中。与三星的类似功能不同，用户无法切换主副画面或选择分屏布局，使两个摄像头画面大小相等。
*   **文件保存**：所有录制内容都保存为一个视频文件，而不是每个摄像头单独的片段。
items.shortSummary: iPhone 17系列引入了“双重拍摄”视频功能，允许同时使用前置和后置摄像头进行画中画录制，非常适合反应视频和教程。用户可在相机应用中轻松启用。录制时，Pro型号可切换镜头，前置摄像头窗口可自由移动。该功能支持1080p或4K分辨率，但采用固定布局（后置为主，前置为小窗口），且所有内容保存为单个视频文件。

images.alt: iphone 17 dual capture move camera window

items.content:
The iPhone 17 lineup brings a new video feature that lets you record from both the front and rear cameras simultaneously. Dual Capture creates picture-in-picture recordings that should be perfect for reaction videos, tutorials, or any scenario where you want to capture both yourself and the action in front of you. Here's what you need to know about the feature.


Dual Capture works across the iPhone 17 series, including the iPhone Air. Here's how to get up and running with the new feature.

iPhone 17: How to Enable Dual Capture Mode


  1. Open the Camera app on your iPhone.

  2. Tap Video at the bottom.

  3. Tap the icon made up of dots at the top right of the interface, or alternatively, swipe up from the selected video option in the carousel at the bottom of the interface.

  4. Select Dual Capture from the pop-up menu, then tap in the viewfinder.

  5. Tap the shutter to start recording via both front and rear cameras.


Once you have used Dual Capture mode, for the rest of the app session the camera interface will show a handy new icon in the top-right corner, allowing you to turn it on and off without involving the pop-up menu.



What You Can Do While Recording


Once you start recording, you gain several useful controls. On iPhone 17 Pro and Pro Max models, you can switch between the 48MP main camera, 48MP ultrawide, and 48MP telephoto lenses for different perspectives without stopping your recording.

The smaller front camera window can also be moved around the screen by dragging it with your finger, which is handy if the preview window blocks something important in your shot. Bear in mind that any repositioning of the window gets saved in your final video, though.


Recording Quality and Limitations


Dual Capture records in either 1080p or 4K resolution at 24 or 30 fps. For maximum editing flexibility later, 4K at 30fps will likely deliver the best results.

The feature does come with some trade-offs. For one, you're locked into Apple's single layout design, where the rear camera takes up most of the frame while the front camera appears in a smaller window. Unlike Samsung's similar feature, you can't switch the feeds or choose a split-screen layout that shows both cameras equally.

Lastly, bear in mind that everything saves as one video file, not separate clips for each camera.

items.title: iFixit 拆解揭示苹果如何将 iPhone Air 做到如此纤薄 (原标题: iFixit Teardown Reveals How Apple Made the iPhone Air So Thin)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# iFixit 拆解 iPhone Air：纤薄设计与可修复性揭秘

iFixit 对苹果迄今为止最薄的 iPhone Air 进行了传统拆解，揭示了这款厚度仅为 5.6 毫米的设备如何实现其超薄设计，以及其出人意料的可修复性。

## 纤薄设计的实现

为了将所有必要组件容纳在 5.6 毫米的框架内，苹果采用了多项创新设计：

*   **摄像头“高原”设计：** iPhone Air 的逻辑板部分位于摄像头凸起（“高原”）内部，为一块大型金属封装电池腾出了宝贵的空间。
*   **逻辑板位置：** 这种布局不仅节省了空间，还确保逻辑板在设备弯曲时能得到保护，尽管该设备的钛金属框架本身几乎是防弯曲的。
*   **框架耐久性：** iFixit 发现，在没有内部组件的情况下，iPhone Air 的框架在苹果为防止蜂窝干扰而添加塑料间隙的薄弱点处容易弯曲。至于这是否会成为用户的问题，iFixit 表示“时间会证明一切”。

## 电池与兼容性

*   **电池确认：** iFixit 证实，iPhone Air 使用的电池与苹果为其设计的 MagSafe 电池组中的电池相同，容量为 12.26 瓦时。
*   **互换性：** 用户可以轻松地将电池从 MagSafe 电池组中取出并放入 iPhone Air 中，反之亦然，没有任何问题。

## 可修复性

尽管设计纤薄，iPhone Air 的可修复性却比预期要好：

*   **设计优势：** 薄型底盘有助于防止零件被深埋。
*   **易于拆卸的组件：** 苹果采用了卡扣式显示屏和后盖玻璃，使其更容易拆卸。
*   **电池更换：** 电池粘合剂可以通过低压电流松动，这是苹果去年在 iPhone 16 中引入的设计，现已扩展到其他型号。
*   **iFixit 评分：** iFixit 给予 iPhone Air 暂定的 7/10 可修复性评分，因为电池易于取出，屏幕更换也不太困难。
*   **苹果的努力：** 苹果还努力发布备件和维修手册，并减少了零件配对的软件锁定和限制，从而提高了其 iPhone 的可修复性分数。

![iPhone Air 拆解显示屏](https://images.macrumors.com/t/ek2p1CDRZkJavwU9mpNhKgW1C30=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/ifixit-iphone-air-teardown-display.jpg?lossy)

## USB-C 端口

*   **3D 打印：** 为了适应纤薄的底盘，iPhone Air 的 USB-C 端口是 3D 打印的。
*   **材料与结构：** iFixit 发现该端口使用了 3D 打印的钛合金，虽然不如框架耐刮擦，但“结构坚固”。
*   **模块化：** 端口虽然用胶水固定，但采用模块化设计，必要时可以拆卸。

## 定制芯片

*   **苹果定制芯片：** iPhone Air 的逻辑板集成了苹果定制设计的 C1X 5G 调制解调器、N1 网络芯片和 A19 Pro 芯片。
*   **首款多定制芯片 iPhone：** 这是首款拥有如此多定制苹果芯片的 iPhone。与其他 iPhone 17 型号不同，iPhone Air 使用 C1X 调制解调器而非高通调制解调器。

![iPhone Air 拆解](https://images.macrumors.com/t/7eJpa2iBXIj2JcqGz-IQCejFEjs=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/ifixit-iphone-air-teardown.jpg?lossy)

建议观看 iFixit 的完整视频，了解 iPhone Air 的详细拆解过程。
items.shortSummary: iFixit 拆解了苹果最薄的 iPhone Air，揭示其 5.6 毫米机身通过将逻辑板部分置于摄像头凸起内来为电池腾出空间。尽管纤薄，但其可修复性得分达 7/10，得益于易于拆卸的显示屏、后盖玻璃和可松动的电池粘合剂。该设备还首次集成了苹果定制的 C1X 5G 调制解调器、N1 网络芯片和 A19 Pro 芯片。USB-C 端口采用 3D 打印钛合金，结构坚固。
items.translated_title: iFixit 拆解揭示苹果如何将 iPhone Air 做到如此纤薄
items.content:
Repair site iFixit today did one of its traditional teardowns on the iPhone Air, which is Apple's thinnest iPhone to date and the first major redesign we've seen in the ‌iPhone‌ line in several years.


To fit all of the necessary components in a 5.6mm frame, Apple designed a camera "plateau." The iPhone Air's logic board is partially inside of the camera bump, providing space for a large, metal-encased battery. The position of the logic board also ensures that it's protected from bending stress if the ‌iPhone Air‌ happens to flex, though we've seen in several tests that the titanium frame of the device is almost bend-proof.

iFixit tried bending the ‌iPhone Air‌ frame without any of the components inside, and it wasn't quite as durable as it is when it's fully packed. The frame easily bent, because there are weak points where Apple had to add plastic gaps to prevent cellular interference. As to whether the weak points will be an issue for ‌iPhone Air‌ owners, iFixit says "time will tell."


Earlier this week, iFixit took apart MagSafe Battery that Apple designed for the ‌iPhone Air‌, and speculated that Apple was using the same battery for the accessory that it used in the ‌iPhone Air‌. That's now confirmed, and Apple did indeed include an ‌iPhone Air‌ battery inside the MagSafe Battery pack. The battery has a 12.26 watt-hour capacity, and you can take the battery out of the ‌MagSafe‌ Battery pack and put it in an ‌iPhone Air‌ with no issue.

Though the ‌iPhone Air‌ has a thinner design than usual, it's easier to repair than you might think. There isn't room for layers of components, and iFixit says that the thin chassis keeps parts from getting buried. Apple is using a clipped-in display and back glass that's easier to remove. For the battery, Apple is using adhesive that can be loosened with low-voltage electrical current. It's a design that Apple introduced last year with the iPhone 16, and now it's expanded to other models.


Apple 3D printed the USB-C port for the ‌iPhone Air‌ to get it to fit in the chassis, and iFixit found that the company is indeed using a 3D printed titanium alloy that's not as scratch resistant as the frame, but is "structurally robust." The USB-C port is glued in place, but it is modular and can be removed if needed.

The ‌iPhone Air‌ logic board includes the C1X 5G modem, the N1 networking chip, and the A19 Pro, all of which Apple designed. The ‌iPhone Air‌ is the first ‌iPhone‌ to have so many custom-designed Apple chips. The other iPhone 17 models also have the A19 and the N1, but the ‌iPhone Air‌ also gets the C1X instead of a Qualcomm modem.

Overall, iFixit gave the ‌iPhone Air‌ a provisional repairability score of 7 out of 10, because it's easier to get to the battery and not too difficult to replace a screen. Apple has also made efforts to release spare parts and manuals for ‌iPhone‌ repair, and has scaled down software locks and restrictions on parts pairing, improving its ‌iPhone‌ repairability scores.

Make sure to watch iFixit's full video to see the ‌iPhone Air‌ disassembled piece by piece.

items.title: 头条新闻：iOS 26、macOS Tahoe、iPhone 17 发布及更多 (原标题: Top Stories: iOS 26, macOS Tahoe, iPhone 17 Launch, and More)
items.creator: MacRumors Staff
items.summary:
本周苹果世界异常繁忙，发布了多款操作系统更新和全新的硬件产品，并展望了未来几个月即将推出的更多产品和软件改进。

## 主要发布与更新

*   **操作系统发布**：
    *   周一，苹果发布了 **iOS 26**、**macOS Tahoe** 以及其他操作系统更新，包括 watchOS 26、tvOS 26、visionOS 26 和 HomePod 软件 26。这些系统采用了统一的版本编号。
    *   ![top stories 2025 09 20](https://images.macrumors.com/t/0lfEuO_yk9d-lrNlR3eHbLJ6LLA=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/top-stories-2025-09-20.jpg?lossy)

*   **硬件产品发布**：
    *   周五，苹果“Awe Dropping”活动中宣布的所有硬件产品正式上市，包括 **iPhone Air**、**iPhone 17 系列**（iPhone 17、iPhone 17 Pro、iPhone 17 Pro Max）、三款新 **Apple Watch 型号**（Apple Watch Series 11、Apple Watch Ultra 3、Apple Watch SE 3）以及 **AirPods Pro 3**。

## iOS 26 特性与用户反馈

*   **终极指南**：MacRumors 发布了详细的 iOS 26 功能指南，涵盖了新软件的设计变化和更新，是新用户或回顾新功能的有用资源。
    *   ![iOS 26 Mega Guide Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/55SsSh7stxp1gaJRV8ULBpIBPWQ=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iOS-26-Mega-Guide-Feature.jpg?lossy)
*   **“液态玻璃”设计**：这是 iOS 26 以及今年所有苹果新操作系统的核心设计特色。然而，该设计引发了用户争议，部分用户批评其导致应用图标看起来歪斜，甚至影响部分内容的易读性。

## macOS Tahoe 及其他平台更新

*   **macOS Tahoe**：也已发布，带来了与 iOS 26 类似的更新，并为 Mac 平台引入了“液态玻璃”设计、电话应用（Phone App）和 Spotlight 操作（Spotlight Actions）等新功能。
    *   ![macOS Tahoe Out Now Thumb 1](https://images.macrumors.com/t/gjjxluWn7dPLxC_lDv3-_CMLCmA=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/macOS-Tahoe-Out-Now-Thumb-1.jpg?lossy)
*   **其他平台**：watchOS 26、tvOS 26、visionOS 26 和 HomePod 软件 26 也获得了更新，全面提升了性能和功能。

## 硬件产品发货与初期问题

*   **订单送达**：iPhone Air、iPhone 17 系列以及新款 Apple Watch 和 AirPods Pro 3 的订单已开始陆续送达客户手中，澳大利亚和新西兰的用户率先收到。
    *   ![better iphone 17 lineup](https://images.macrumors.com/t/LY_yvQMWR7LSS0ju0-GkJjJEA4A=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/better-iphone-17-lineup.jpg?lossy)
*   **供货情况**：预购期间部分 iPhone 配置的预计发货时间延长，但零售店在发售初期供应充足。目前供应略有收紧，但苹果每天都在补货。
*   **外观问题**：据报道，部分 iPhone 17 Pro 和 iPhone Air 型号（尤其是深蓝色和深空黑色）更容易出现划痕和磨损。

## AirPods 固件更新

*   **功能下放**：通过新的固件更新，AirPods Pro 2 和 AirPods 4（带主动降噪功能）的用户提前获得了 AirPods Pro 3 的部分新功能。
    *   ![AirPods Pro Firmware Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/9NvRO4p0bPE-rOw0z70Pc-9RhhY=/400x0/article-new/2021/11/AirPods-Pro-Firmware-Feature.jpg?lossy)
*   **新增功能**：包括实时翻译（Live Translation）、助听器功能增强、改进的“录音棚级”音频捕捉和相机远程手势等。

## 苹果未来产品计划与 iOS 26 后续更新

*   **未来产品**：据彭博社的 Mark Gurman 报道，苹果计划在未来几个月内（最早从 10 月开始）推出至少十款新产品。预计更新产品包括 Apple TV、HomePod mini、AirTag、iPad Pro，以及多款 Mac 更新（可能在 2026 年初）。
    *   ![Tim Cook Rainbow](https://images.macrumors.com/t/bbb9-63GOpljygN6O5yti_qjbMQ=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/Tim-Cook-Rainbow.jpg?lossy)
*   **iOS 26 后续更新**：iOS 26 发布后，苹果将在未来一年内通过 iOS 26.1 至 iOS 26.4 等版本带来更多改进。
    *   ![iOS 26](https://images.macrumors.com/t/kNmJGc1WKHpbB_a28crv3zDlfQI=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iOS-26.1-Feature.jpg?lossy)
*   **预期新功能**：
    *   最受期待的是此前推迟的个性化 Siri，预计将在 2026 年上半年随 iOS 26.4 发布。
    *   其他可能的功能包括：钱包应用支持美国数字护照、RCS 消息升级、新表情符号以及 iOS 26 代码中发现的卫星天气功能。
    *   iOS 26.0.1 预计很快发布，可能修复 iPhone Air 和 iPhone 17 Pro 的相机相关错误。

items.translated_title: 头条新闻：iOS 26、macOS Tahoe、iPhone 17 发布及更多
items.content:
It was another busy week in the Apple world, with Monday seeing the release of iOS 26, macOS Tahoe, and other operating system updates, while Friday saw the launch of all of the hardware announced at the company's "Awe Dropping" event, including the iPhone Air, iPhone 17 lineup, three new Apple Watch models, and the AirPods Pro 3.


We're also looking forward to what's coming in additional updates to iOS 26 and on the hardware front in the coming months, so read on below for all the details!

Top Stories


iOS 26 Features: The Ultimate Mega Guide


iOS 26 is finally here for everyone! Over the past several months, MacRumors has been working on a series of in-depth feature guides and how-tos that walk you through the design changes and updates in Apple's new software, and our ultimate guide includes a big chunk of that iOS 26 coverage. It's a useful resource for iPhone and iPad users who haven't had a chance to test out ‌iOS 26‌ until now, or those who might want a recap on what's new.


The new Liquid Glass design is of course the headline feature of iOS 26, and in fact across all of Apple's new operating systems this year, but not everyone is a fan of it.

macOS Tahoe Now Available With Liquid Glass Design, Phone App, Spotlight Actions and More


iOS 26 naturally gets the bulk of the attention given the size of the iPhone user base, but macOS Tahoe brings a lot of the same updates and some other changes to the Mac platform as well. Take a look at our video and list of some of the top macOS Tahoe features to check out first.


Apple's other platforms also got the usual updates, with watchOS 26, tvOS 26, visionOS 26, and HomePod software 26 delivering improvements across the board with Apple's newly unified version numbering system.

First iPhone Air, iPhone 17, and iPhone 17 Pro Orders Now Arriving to Customers


Apple customers in Australia and New Zealand were the first to receive their iPhone Air, iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max orders, with the rest of the world gradually following. Early orders of the AirPods Pro 3, Apple Watch Series 11, Apple Watch Ultra 3, and Apple Watch SE 3 are also arriving.


While many iPhone configurations saw extended shipping estimates during the pre-order period, Apple retail stores appeared to have decent supply of most models as stores opened for the launch. Supplies have since tightened somewhat, but Apple is resupplying its stores daily so hopefully you shouldn't have to wait long if you place an order now for pickup.

AirPods Pro 2 and AirPods 4 Get iOS 26 Features With New Firmware Update


The new AirPods Pro 3 just launched on Friday, but users of the AirPods Pro 2 and AirPods 4 with Active Noise Cancellation got early access to some of the new capabilities thanks to a firmware update.


The new Live Translation feature revealed at last week's event comes to the older models, as do Hearing Aid functionality enhancements, improved "studio-quality" audio capture, a camera remote gesture, and more.

Apple Reportedly Plans to Launch These 10 Products in 'Coming Months'


With four new iPhone models, three updated Apple Watch models, and AirPods Pro 3 having debuted last week, you might think Apple will be taking a break before introducing any more new products, but that doesn't appear to be the case.


According to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman, Apple has at least ten new products ready to launch in the coming months, starting as early as October. We're expecting updates to the Apple TV, HomePod mini, AirTag, iPad Pro, and more, with several Mac updates likely to arrive in early 2026.

iOS 26.1 to iOS 26.4: Here Are 5 New Features to Expect on Your iPhone


iOS 26 may have just been released, but Apple will still be bringing additional refinements over the coming year before its next major update with iOS 27.


The biggest mid-cycle update we're expecting to see is the personalized Siri that was delayed from earlier this year. We should be seeing that around iOS 26.4 in the first half of 2026. Other updates we may see include support for digital versions of U.S. passports in the Wallet app, upgrades for RCS messaging, new emoji, a Weather via satellite feature we've spotted in iOS 26 code, and more.

MacRumors Newsletter


Each week, we publish an email newsletter like this highlighting the top Apple stories, making it a great way to get a bite-sized recap of the week hitting all of the major topics we've covered and tying together related stories for a big-picture view.

So if you want to have top stories like the above recap delivered to your email inbox each week, subscribe to our newsletter!

items.title: iPhone 17 系列上手体验：Air 的纤薄与 Pro 的强大 (原标题: iPhone 17 Lineup Hands On: Air's Thinness vs Pro's Power)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# iPhone 17 系列上手体验：Air 的纤薄与 Pro 的强大

## 概述
苹果最新 iPhone 17 系列（包括 iPhone Air、iPhone 17 Pro 和 iPhone 17 Pro Max）已正式上市。本文提供了对这些新机型的初步上手印象。

## iPhone Air：极致纤薄
*   **设计亮点:**
    *   **惊人的纤薄:** iPhone Air 厚度仅为 5.6mm，手感极其轻巧，与厚重的 Pro 型号形成鲜明对比，带来“哇”的惊喜感。
    *   **轻巧便携:** 对于不喜欢大尺寸 iPhone 重量用户来说，Air 是一个极大的解脱。
*   **核心性能:**
    *   **A19 Pro 芯片:** 搭载 A19 Pro 芯片，性能与 Pro 型号保持一致。
*   **摄像头系统:**
    *   **单镜头限制:** 后置摄像头为单镜头设计，缺少超广角和长焦镜头，这对于习惯使用多镜头的用户来说可能是一个遗憾。
    *   **智能人像模式:** 尽管是单镜头，但苹果通过软件优化，使其支持可编辑的人像模式照片。
    *   **前置摄像头:** 配备与 Pro 型号相同的 18 兆像素前置摄像头。
*   **电池续航:**
    *   **表现出色:** 尽管机身纤薄，iPhone Air 的电池续航表现依然令人印象深刻。
*   **图片:**
    *   ![iphone 17 pro air](https://images.macrumors.com/t/-Zk4o3nb1SKceTpLgl1zvP2dvbU=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iphone-17-pro-air.jpg?lossy)
    *   ![iphone air thickness](https://images.macrumors.com/t/Ylab1G483FPjntDX5sgtX2ZA2v0=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iphone-air-thickness.jpg?lossy)

## iPhone 17 Pro 和 Pro Max：强大与创新
*   **手感与尺寸:**
    *   **厚重感:** 相较于 Air，Pro 型号感觉更厚重。
    *   **最佳平衡:** iPhone 17 Pro 被认为是大多数用户的理想选择，因为它在专业功能、显示屏尺寸和重量之间取得了良好平衡。
*   **外观与材质:**
    *   **新颖配色:** 苹果今年提供了有趣的颜色选择，亮橙色 Pro 型号尤为突出。银色版本也出奇地好看。
    *   **回归铝制:** 放弃了钛金属，回归铝制机身，因为苹果发现钛金属不利于散热。
    *   **双色调设计:** 机身大部分为铝制边框，背面用于无线充电的矩形区域采用 Ceramic Shield 材料，这是苹果首次在 iPhone 背面使用 Ceramic Shield，旨在提高耐用性。
    *   **更强保护:** 正面覆盖 Ceramic Shield 2，抗刮擦能力更强，并更新了抗反射涂层（效果不明显）。
*   **散热系统革新:**
    *   **均热板冷却:** 引入全新的均热板（vapor chamber）冷却系统，以最大化 A19 Pro 芯片的散热性能。
    *   **内部液体冷却:** Pro 型号内部含有少量液体，用于将热量从芯片传导至铝制外壳。
    *   **解决发热:** 初步测试显示，iPhone 17 Pro 型号在进行 GPU 密集型任务时，似乎没有 16 Pro 型号那样的即时发热问题。
*   **摄像头系统升级:**
    *   **摄像头平台:** 摄像头设计不再是简单的凸起，而是形成一个“摄像头平台”，尺寸较大，但可能带来更对称的美感。
    *   **48MP 长焦镜头:** Pro 型号配备 48 兆像素长焦镜头，支持 4 倍或 8 倍光学变焦，提供更远的变焦能力，并能拍出出色的人像虚化效果。
    *   **创新自拍:** 前置摄像头支持无需旋转手机即可拍摄横向或纵向自拍。
    *   **双向录制:** 支持同时使用前后摄像头录制视频，适用于反应式视频内容创作。
*   **电池续航提升:**
    *   **显著增长:** Pro 和 Pro Max 型号的电池续航有更大提升，据苹果测试，续航时间延长了六小时。
*   **图片:**
    *   ![iphone 17 line size display](https://images.macrumors.com/t/4Ty_YlBTeN5uI5tV41nnMujs9ks=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iphone-17-line-size-display.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: iPhone 17 系列已上市，包括极致纤薄的 iPhone Air 和强大的 Pro 型号。Air 厚度仅 5.6mm，搭载 A19 Pro 芯片，但仅配备单镜头后置摄像头。Pro 和 Pro Max 型号回归铝制机身，并引入均热板冷却系统以优化散热。Pro 型号配备 48 兆像素长焦镜头，支持 4 倍/8 倍变焦，背面首次采用 Ceramic Shield。所有型号的电池续航均有提升，前置摄像头功能也得到创新。
items.translated_title: iPhone 17 系列上手体验：Air 的纤薄与 Pro 的强大
items.content:
Happy iPhone 17 day! The iPhone Air and the other new ‌iPhone 17‌ models are now available in stores and in the hands of customers. We picked up the ‌iPhone Air‌, iPhone 17 Pro, and ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ Max for a first impressions video.

Subscribe to the MacRumors YouTube channel for more videos.

Unsurprisingly, the ‌iPhone Air‌ is incredibly thin, and holding one after holding the much larger Pro models makes for a real "wow" moment. If the weight of the bigger iPhones bothers you, the Air will be a relief.

There's not too much to say about the Air other than fawning over its 5.6mm thin design. It does have the A19 Pro for performance on par with the Pro models, but it's limited to a single-lens rear camera. If you use the Ultra Wide or Telephoto lenses, you'll miss them. Apple did make some under-the-hood changes that allow the Air to support editable portrait mode photos with a single lens, and you do get the same 18-megapixel front-facing camera that the other models have.


Moving on to the Pro models, the 17 Pro and Pro Max feel hefty this year compared to the Air. The 17 Pro is probably the size that most people will prefer because it's a good blend of pro features, display size, and weight.

Apple made interesting color choices this year, and the bright orange Pro color stands out. We got the Pro Max in the orange shade and the Pro in the silver, and the silver is surprisingly nice. It's one of the better light silver shades that Apple has come out with. There is no titanium this year, because Apple discovered that it wasn't great for dissipating heat. We're back to aluminum, and there's a whole new vapor chamber cooling system to maximize the thermal performance of the A19 Pro chip.


You won't see it, but the ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ models have a little bit of water inside to direct heat away from the chip and through the aluminum casing. It's still early, but the ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ models don't seem to have the immediate heat issues of the 16 Pro models when doing GPU-heavy tasks.

Apple updated the ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ design, and instead of a camera bump, we have a whole camera plateau. It's big, but some people might appreciate the symmetry of the new design. There's also a two-tone sort of look because most of the frame is aluminum with just a rectangle at the back made from Ceramic Shield material for wireless charging. This is the first time that Apple has used Ceramic Shield for the back of the iPhone, and it's supposed to be more durable. Apple says the front cover is Ceramic Shield 2, which is more scratch resistant than before. There's an updated anti-reflective coating as well, but it's subtle.

Battery life on the ‌iPhone Air‌ is impressive for its size, but the Pro and Pro Max have bigger gains. Battery life is six hours longer per Apple's testing, though we'll need more time to see what that means in day-to-day usage.

The new front-facing camera has a feature that lets you take landscape or portrait selfie shots without rotating the phone, which is unique. You can also record with the front and rear-facing cameras at the same time if you want to do reaction-style videos.


The Pro models have a 48-megapixel Telephoto lens with 4x or 8x zoom, so you can zoom in further than before. It's useful to have another focal length, and it produces nice bokeh for portrait shots.

Make sure to stay tuned to MacRumors because we'll have more in-depth videos coming, including Camera comparisons and videos where we pit Apple's new iPhones against popular smartphones from Samsung and Google.

items.title: 标准版iPhone 17表现超预期，苹果加紧生产 (原标题: Standard iPhone 17 Outperforms Expectations as Apple Ramps Up Manufacturing)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## 标准版iPhone 17需求旺盛，苹果增产应对

苹果公司正因标准版iPhone 17的意外强劲需求而增加其产量。据《The Information》报道，在预购周末表现出色后，苹果已通知两家供应商将标准版iPhone 17的日产量提高至少30%。

### 需求强劲的原因

*   **价格优势：** 标准版iPhone 17起售价为799美元，比iPhone Air便宜200美元，比起售价1099美元的iPhone 17 Pro便宜300美元。
*   **功能升级：** 今年，标准版iPhone 17首次获得了“Pro”级功能，包括120Hz刷新率和全天候显示技术，并且其尺寸（6.3英寸）与iPhone 17 Pro相同。

### 市场影响与苹果策略

*   **Pro型号销售担忧：** 苹果决定增加标准版iPhone 17的产量，暗示iPhone 17 Pro型号今年的销售可能不如往常。
*   **潜在财务影响：** 如果Pro型号销售不佳，可能会对苹果的毛利率和9月季度的营收产生影响。
*   **初始生产分配：** 在iPhone 17发布前，苹果将25%的iPhone 17生产分配给标准型号，10%分配给Air型号，65%分配给Pro和Pro Max型号，因为这些通常是苹果最畅销的设备。
*   **第四款型号的挑战：** 苹果一直在努力寻找能吸引消费者兴趣的第四款iPhone型号。
    *   “mini”系列：销量未达预期。
    *   “Plus”系列：销量同样令人失望。
    *   “Air”系列：目前转向超薄的Air型号，希望通过全新设计吸引客户升级。
*   **iPhone Air的区域限制：** 由于eSIM-only设计的监管问题，iPhone Air尚未在中国上市。这可能导致更多中国消费者选择标准版iPhone 17。
*   **生产预测灵活性：** 苹果每周更新设备预测，因此供应商被要求优先生产的iPhone型号组合可能会发生变化。

![iPhone 17型号](https://images.macrumors.com/t/VSni_ZG4jdFymrV_LCWd-x4Grds=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iphone-17-models.jpg?lossy)
*图片：iPhone 17型号示意图*
items.shortSummary: 苹果因标准版iPhone 17需求超出预期，已通知供应商将日产量提高至少30%。该型号以799美元的较低价格提供了120Hz刷新率和全天候显示等“Pro”级功能，吸引力大增。此举可能暗示iPhone 17 Pro型号销售不佳，并可能影响苹果的财务表现。此外，iPhone Air因eSIM监管问题尚未在中国上市，也可能促使中国消费者转向标准版iPhone 17。
items.translated_title: 标准版iPhone 17表现超预期，苹果加紧生产
items.content:
Apple is increasing production on the standard iPhone 17 due to unexpected demand for the device, reports The Information. Following a strong pre-order weekend, Apple told two suppliers to increase daily ‌iPhone 17‌ output by at least 30 percent.


The ‌iPhone 17‌ is priced starting at $799, and it is $200 cheaper than the iPhone Air. It's $300 less than the iPhone 17 Pro, which now starts at $1,099. This year, the ‌iPhone 17‌ got "Pro" features with the addition of a 120Hz refresh rate and Always-On display technology, plus it is the same size as the 17 Pro at 6.3 inches.

According to The Information, Apple's decision to increase ‌iPhone 17‌ production suggests that the ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ models are not selling as well as usual this year. If that's the case, it could have consequences for Apple's gross margin and September quarter revenue.

Ahead of the ‌iPhone 17‌ launch, Apple allocated 25 percent of its ‌iPhone 17‌ production to the standard model, 10 percent to the Air, and 65 percent to the Pro and Pro Max, as those are typically Apple's best-selling devices.

The standard iPhone and the two Pro models have been staples in Apple's ‌iPhone‌ line, but the company has struggled to find a fourth model that draws consumer interest. It started with the "mini" iPhones that were smaller than the ‌iPhone 17‌. Those didn't sell as well as expected, so Apple moved on to the "Plus" size, offering standard ‌iPhone‌ features paired with a larger display. The Plus ‌iPhone‌ sales were also disappointing, so Apple has now moved to the ultra thin Air, and the company is hoping that a fresh design will lure customers into upgrading.

The ‌iPhone Air‌ is not yet available in China because of regulatory issues with the eSIM-only design. As a result, more Chinese customers may be opting for the standard ‌iPhone 17‌.

Apple updates its device forecasts on a weekly basis, so the mix of ‌iPhone‌ models that suppliers are asked to prioritize could shift.
